info.description: API for Khel, a complete sport application.
info.title: Khel API

get.description: Retrieves all ads with pagination for admin dashboard

post.description: Creates a new advertisement with file upload

get.description: Retrieves analytics data for all advertisements

post.description: Updates display order for multiple ads in a single transaction

get.description: Retrieves a single ad by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing advertisement with optional file upload

post.description: Toggles the active status of an advertisement

get.description: Returns all roles assigned to the given user.

post.description: Assigns a role (by role_id) to the specified user.
post.summary: Assign a role to a user

delete.description: Removes a specific role from a user by role_id.
delete.summary: Remove a role from a user

get.description: Retrieves all active ads for the mobile app carousel

post.description: Increments the click count for an advertisement
Increments the impression count for an advertisement

get.description: Returns all app reviews from all users.

post.description: Allows authenticated users to submit a rating and feedback for the app.
Validates the provided refresh token and issues new access and refresh tokens.
Request password reset
Creates a token for a user after signin or login.
Registers a user via Mobile App, Server will send activation url on email and need to click there to verify its your email
Create a new game with details such as sport type, venue, start time, and end time.

get.description: Returns a list of games. Authentication is optional; if an API key is provided, user's shortlisted games will be included.

parameters.description: Sport type to filter games (e.g., basketball)
parameters.name: sport_type

parameters.description: Filter games based on booking status (e.g., available, booked, pending)
parameters.name: booking_status

parameters.description: Radius in kilometers for location-based filtering (0 for no filter)
parameters.name: radius

parameters.description: Filter games starting after this time (RFC3339 format)
parameters.name: start_after

parameters.description: Filter games ending before this time (RFC3339 format)
parameters.name: end_before

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return
parameters.name: limit

200.description: List of games and GeoJSON features

get.description: Returns a list of upcoming active games that the authenticated user has joined.
get.summary: List upcoming active games for the current user

200.description: List of upcoming active games for user

401.description: Unauthorized: missing or invalid API key

500.description: Internal Server Error: could not retrieve upcoming games

get.description: Returns a list of games that the authenticated user has shortlisted.
get.summary: Retrieve shortlisted games for the authenticated user

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not retrieve shortlist

get.description: Returns detailed information for a specific game including venue details and player images

post.description: Accepts a pending join request for a game by updating the request status to accepted and inserting the player into the game. The game ID is provided in the URL path and the user ID is provided in the request body.
post.summary: Accept a join request for a game

parameters.description: Payload containing the user ID to accept
parameters.name: payload

200.description: Message confirming the join request acceptance and player addition

400.description: Invalid game ID, payload error, or request is not in pending state

post.description: Allows a game admin to assign the assistant role to a player for a specified game.
post.summary: Assign an assistant role to a player

parameters.description: Player ID to be assigned as assistant
parameters.name: playerID

400.description: Invalid game ID, invalid player ID, or player not found/already an assistant

403.description: Only game admins can assign assistants

patch.description: Allows an admin to cancel a game

get.description: Fetches the list of players participating in a specific game. The game ID is provided in the URL path.
Get all questions with replies for a game
get.summary: Get all Q&A for a game

get.description: Get all questions for a game

post.description: Create a new question for a game
Create a reply to a question (admin only)
Rejects a pending join request for a game. The game ID is specified in the URL path and the user ID is provided in the request body.
post.summary: Reject a join request for a game

parameters.description: Payload containing the user ID of the join request to reject
parameters.name: payload

200.description: Message confirming the join request was rejected

400.description: Invalid game ID, payload error, or request is not pending

post.description: Allows a user to send a request to join a specific game. The game ID is provided in the URL path.
post.summary: Send a request to join a game

delete.description: Allows a user to delete their previously sent join request for a specific game.
delete.summary: Delete a join request for a game

get.description: Retrieve all join requests for a specific game by game ID, including user details.
get.summary: Get all join requests for a game

200.description: List of join requests with user details

post.description: Allows authenticated users to add a game to their shortlist.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid game ID or unauthenticated request

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not add shortlist

delete.description: Allows authenticated users to remove a game from their shortlist.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid game ID or unauthenticated request

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not remove shortlist

patch.description: Allows an admin to toggle match full status

get.description: Returns a list of upcoming active games for the specified venue.
get.summary: Retrieve upcoming active games at a venue

400.description: Bad Request: Missing or invalid venueID

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not retrieve upcoming games

get.description: Healthcheck endpoint

delete.description: Deletes a specific push token for the current user

post.description: Creates a new brand with optional logo upload to Cloudinary. Name is required; slug is optional (auto-generated from name if empty).

parameters.description: Brand slug (optional, auto-generated from name if empty)
parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: Brand logo image (JPEG, PNG, WEBP; max 3MB)
parameters.name: logo

400.description: Bad Request: invalid form data, missing name, or invalid slug/image type

409.description: Conflict: brand with the same name or slug already exists

500.description: Internal Server Error: failed to upload logo or create brand

delete.description: Deletes a brand by ID. Fails if the brand is referenced by any products.

409.description: Conflict: brand has dependent products or records

patch.description: Updates brand fields (name, slug, description) and optionally replaces the logo image. Partial updates are supported: only provided fields are changed.

parameters.description: Optional brand logo image (jpeg, png, webp)
parameters.name: logo

409.description: Conflict: brand name or slug already exists

post.description: Creates a new product category with optional parent and logo image.

parameters.description: URL-friendly slug (auto-generated from name if omitted)
parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: Whether the category is active (default: true)
parameters.name: is_active

400.description: Bad Request: invalid input or file

409.description: Conflict: category with same name or slug already exists

delete.description: Deletes a category and asynchronously removes its images from Cloudinary. Fails if category has children or dependent records.

400.description: Bad Request: invalid category ID or category has children

patch.description: Partially updates a category's fields and optionally uploads/replaces a logo image.

parameters.description: If true, replaces existing logos instead of appending
parameters.name: replace_logo

get.description: List all orders for the admin dashboard. Supports optional status filter and pagination.
Get a single order with its line items for the admin dashboard.

patch.description: Update an order's status. If status is cancelled, cancelled_reason may be provided and cancelled_at is set.

get.description: Returns paginated users. Optional role filter (?role=admin|owner|customer|merchant). Includes each user's roles.

200.description: users list with pagination and filters

get.description: Returns a user profile + aggregated stats + up to 5 recent items per section (orders, bookings, upcoming games).
Returns a paginated list of brands.

parameters.description: Items per page (default from server, max usually 100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Returns a paginated list of categories.
Performs a simple search on categories by name/slug using ILIKE or trigram search.
Performs full-text search on categories using the FTS index.
Returns the full category tree (parent/children hierarchy). Optionally includes inactive categories.
Returns a single category by its ID, with some basic stats (e.g. product count, children count).
Returns a paginated list of product cards for the admin panel. Supports optional filtering by category slug.

200.description: products list with pagination and applied filters

get.description: Returns product detail (product + related entities) by slug. Only active products are returned.
Returns a single product by its ID.

put.description: Update user information such as first name, last name, skill level, and phone number

parameters.description: Request body containing fields to update: first_name, last_name, skill_level, phone
parameters.name: body

400.description: Bad request, update values can't be nil

put.description: Activate a user account using an activation token provided in the URL

get.description: Returns every booking made by the specified user, including venue details.
get.summary: List all bookings for a user

post.description: logout user which will nullify refresh token

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated users profile information

delete.description: Deletes the logged-in user's account and Cloudinary profile photo

put.description: Updates a user's profile picture, saves the new URL in the database, and deletes the old one from Cloudinary

400.description: Unable to parse form or retrieve file

500.description: Failed to upload image to Cloudinary, update database, or delete old image

post.description: Uploads a user's profile picture and saves the URL in the database

parameters.description: Profile picture file size limit is 2MB
parameters.name: profile_picture

400.description: Unable to parse form or retrieve file

500.description: Failed to upload image to Cloudinary or save URL in database

post.description: Stores or updates a user's Expo push token along with optional device info
post.summary: Save or update a push notification token

post.description: Deletes multiple push tokens (admin-only)
Removes push tokens not updated within the specified duration (admin-only)

patch.description: Update any combination of first name, last name, phone, skill level, and/or profile picture in one call.

400.description: Bad request (e.g. parse error, invalid field)

get.description: Retrieve detailed information for a venue including aggregated review and game statistics.

post.description: Register a new venue with details such as name, address, location, and amenities.
post.summary: Register a venue in our system

get.description: Returns a list of venues that the authenticated user has marked as favorites.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not retrieve favorites

get.description: Determines whether the authenticated user owns at least one venue
get.summary: Check if user is a venue owner

get.description: Get paginated list of venues with filters
Search active venues by name or sport using partial (ILIKE + trigram) matching.

400.description: Bad Request: Missing or empty search query

get.description: Perform full-text search on active venues using weighted ranking on name and sport.

200.description: Successful response with ranked venue results

400.description: Bad Request: Missing or empty search query

delete.description: Deletes a venue by ID and removes all associated images from Cloudinary.
delete.summary: Delete a venue from the system

patch.description: Allows venue owners to update partial information about their venue.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not update venue

get.description: Returns one-hour buckets (with availability) for a given venue/day.
get.summary: List available time slots for a venue

post.description: Books a venue for the specified time slot if available and calculates the total price based on the applicable pricing slot.

409.description: Conflict: Time slot is already booked

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not create booking

post.description: Venue owners can create a confirmed booking manually by specifying start/end time, price, and optional customer details.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid input or validation failed

409.description: Conflict: Time slot is already booked

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not create booking

post.description: Marks the booking with status="pending or confirmed" as "canceled".
post.summary: Cancel a pending booking request or confirmed booking

get.description: Returns all bookings with status="canceled" for a given venue and date.
get.summary: List Canceled booking requests for a venue

post.description: Allows authenticated users to add a venue to their favorites list.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid venue ID or unauthenticated request

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not add favorite

delete.description: Allows authenticated users to remove a venue from their favorites list.

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid venue ID or unauthenticated request

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not remove favorite

get.description: Returns all bookings with status="pending" for a given venue and date.
get.summary: List pending booking requests for a venue

post.description: Marks the booking with status="pending" as "confirmed".
Marks the booking with status="pending" as "rejected".

get.description: Returns a list of all image URLs associated with the specified venue.

post.description: Uploads a new venue photo to Cloudinary and adds the new photo URL to the venue record.
post.summary: Upload a new photo for a venue

400.description: Bad Request: Invalid input or missing file

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not process the upload

delete.description: Deletes a specific venue photo from Cloudinary and removes it from the database.

400.description: Bad Request: Missing venue ID or photo URL

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not delete photo

get.description: Returns all pricing slots for the specified venue. If the optional `day` query parameter is provided (e.g., `?day=monday`), only slots for that day will be returned.
get.summary: Retrieve pricing slots for a venue (optionally filtered by day)

parameters.description: Day of week (sunday, monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday)
parameters.name: day

post.description: Adds new day/time price rules to venue_pricing in bulk
post.summary: Create one or more pricing slots for a venue

put.description: Allows venue owners to update the pricing information (day, time range, and price) for a specific pricing slot.
put.summary: Update a pricing slot for a venue

500.description: Internal Server Error: Could not update pricing

delete.description: Allows venue owners to delete a specific pricing slot.
delete.summary: Delete a pricing slot for a venue

404.description: Not Found: No such pricing slot

get.description: Retrieves all reviews for a specific venue along with the total count and average rating.

200.description: Reviews, total review count, and average rating

post.description: Creates a new review for a specific venue. The review includes a rating and comment.
post.summary: Create a review for a venue

delete.description: Deletes a review for a venue. This operation is allowed only if the requester is the review owner.

get.description: Returns all bookings with status="confirmed" for a given venue and date.
get.summary: List Scheduled booking requests for a venue

get.description: Retrieves detailed information (name, address, description, status, etc.) about a venue by its ID.

startTime.description:
Note: start_time and end_time are stored as TIME in the DB.
We use time.Time to hold the time part.

admin_id.description: Foreign key to users table (game admin)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the game was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the game was last updated

admin_id.description: Foreign key to users table (game admin)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the game was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the game was last updated

slots.description: we use dive, required to ensure each item inside the array is individually validated.

main.ErrorBadRequestResponse.description: Standard error response format returned by all bad request API endpoints

main.ErrorInternalServerResponse.description: Standard error response format returned by all internal server error API endpoints
